message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me there?
I understand your offer of $70, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $82.50. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you consider that?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I can do $80, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $80. How about $77?
I understand your hesitation, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $80. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $79.50. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not sure about $79.50. How about we meet in the middle at $78.50?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $80, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $79.00. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $79. Can we meet at $78?
